mapper.select: SELECT BEUID, PBALNOW FROM (SELECT MIN(BALANCENUM) BALANCENUM, BEUID FROM PBALANCE WHERE BEUID = #{beuid} GROUP BY BEUID) A, (SELECT PBALNOW, BALANCENUM FROM PBALANCE WHERE BEUID = #{beuid}) B WHERE A.BALANCENUM = B.BALANCENUM
SELECT CHARGELIST, CHARGEDATE, CHARGEMETHOD FROM PCHARGE WHERE BEUID = #{BEUID}
SELECT PAYLIST, PAYDATE FROM PPAY WHERE BEUID = #{BEUID}
